mapper.insert: insert into order_head values (#{orderNo}, #{buyerCd}, #{orderdate}, #{employeeCd}, null, '승인대기', null, null, null)
mapper.select:
select distinct h.* from order_head h left outer join order_item i on h.order_no = i.order_no
and h.order_no like '%' || #{orderNo} || '%'
and h.buyer_cd like '%' || #{buyerCd} || '%'
and h.orderdate between #{orderFromDate} and #{orderToDate}
and h.employee_cd like '%' || #{employeeCd} || '%'
and h.status like '%' || #{status} || '%'
and i.product_cd like '%' || #{productCd} || '%'
and i.requestdate between #{requestFromDate} and #{requestToDate}
order by h.orderdate desc
select distinct * from order_head h, m_employee e where h.employee_cd=e.employee_cd order by h.orderdate desc, h.order_no asc
mapper.update: update order_head set status = '승인요청', statusdate = sysdate where order_no=#{orderNo}
update order_head set status = '승인대기', statusdate = sysdate where order_no=#{orderNo}
